caption: A male vocalist sings this animated and upbeat pop song. The song starts with a slow tempo with male vocals and soft but emphatic piano accompaniment and cello drone, and a whirring sound like a camera rolling. Post this the song picks up to an upbeat tempo with hard hitting drumming, cymbal rides, upbeat synthesiser harmony and electronic instruments.
